title: Integration config YAML schema
description: YAML schema for integration configuration file of OMTool

filenames.description: List of filenames to be read by tool.

output_file.description: Path to file where output model would be saved.

overwrite.description: Should the program overwrite model file if it already exists or not.

model_time.description: Time of the system until which integration would be performed.

snapshot_interval.description: Interval between to consecutive snapshots to write to output file

timestep.description: Timestep coefficient (actual timestep is model_time * e^(-timestep)).

logging.description: Object that stores configuration for logger.

filename.description: Filename where JSON logs would be stored.

datefmt.description: Format of the date provided to logging module.

logs.description: List of points to log to file. Note that for now each point should have separate log file.

filename.description: Path to file where particles parameters would be stored.

point_id.description: ID of particles to track. It corresponds one from initial model.
